result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Ralph Eifert

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Called cases 15CM274 and 15CT139 Defendant Robert Ralph Eifert in court with attorney Jaclyn R. Shelton case 15CM274 and Attorney Doyle case 15CT139.  Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court heard, reviews charges, penalties and rights.  Def pleads NC to ct. 1 OWI (4th) case 15CT139.  Court reviews PQ&WOR, finds factual basis, finds plea made FVK&I, accepts plea and finds def guilty of ct. 1 OWI (4th) case 15CT139, ct. 2 Operating w/PAC in case 15CT139 is dismissed. Ct. 1 Bail Jumping in case 15CM274 is DRI. Atty Tienstra heard. Atty Doyle heard. Def makes statement. Court heard and imposes sentence of:
75 days DCJ w/H&T on or before 10/16/15
$600 F+C to be paid at $75/mo by payment plan with COC or serve 34 days DCJ consecutive
27 mo REV & IIL
AODA and any treatment
VIP w/in 120 days
$40 Blood Draw to Waupun Hosp w/in 60 days
BAC .058

Defendant Robert Ralph Eifert in court with attorney Jaclyn R. Shelton.  Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 15CT139 Def. is represented by Atty. Doyle and to be heard at 2:30; Atty. Shelton asks that this case track with 15CT139 when that is called; JT remains; bond cont.
Defendant shall not consume alcohol or other intoxicants.  Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety.

12:52 - Defendant Robert Ralph Eifert in court, in custody with attorney Greg E. Vollan (eligible).   Intern Kevin Schmidt in person w/ADA Gilbert Grant Thompson by phone for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court enters Not Guilty plea. Court finds probable cause. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall not consume alcohol or other intoxicants.  Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety.  Return date scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
